section:
== Parceable
A _Parceable_ is the Android implementation of the Java Serializable. As it assume a certain structure and way of processing it is relatively fast compared to the standard Java serialization.
To allow your custom object to be parsed to another component they need to implement the `android.os.Parcelable` interface. It must also provide a static final method called `CREATOR` which must implement the `Parcelable.Creator` interface.
<xi:include xmlns:xi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XInclude" parse="text" href="./examples/parcel/Student.java[] ----
Once you have defined this, you can put it into the extra of an intent.
<xi:include xmlns:xi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XInclude" parse="text" href="./examples/parcel/intent.java[] ----
To access the parcel on the other side, you can use the following example code.
<xi:include xmlns:xi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XInclude" parse="text" href="./examples/parcel/getParcel.java[] ----
